title: Glimpses of Light
description: This is the first book of a series of short story collections that is intended to be equally enjoyed by people belonging to different cultures. Particularly, it aims to introduce those unfamiliar with Eastern Arabic culture to it emphasizing that precious point: Things that really matter, our need for love, our need to follow our conscience and how important it is for us all to end others' suffering and support those in pain, are common among us all.
author: Gehan Abouelseoud
